ContentIcon/GetContentType.description: Returns the content type used to save and restore the content icon in a spawnlist.

ContentIcon/GetNPCWeapon.description: Returns a table of weapon classes for the content icon with "NPC" content type to be randomly chosen from when user tries to spawn the NPC.

ContentIcon/GetSpawnName.description: Returns the internal "name" for the content icon, usually a class name for an entity.

ContentIcon/OpenMenu.description: A hook for override, by default does nothing. Called when user right clicks on the content icon, you are supposed to open a

ContentIcon/SetAdminOnly.description: Sets whether the content item is admin only. This makes the icon to display a admin icon in the top left corner of the icon.

ContentIcon/SetColor.description: Sets the color for the content icon. Currently is not used by the content icon panel.

ContentIcon/SetContentType.description: Sets the content type used to save and restore the content icon in a spawnlist.

ContentIcon/SetMaterial.description: Sets the material to be displayed as the content icon.

ContentIcon/SetNPCWeapon.description: Sets a table of weapon classes for the content icon with "NPC" content type to be randomly chosen from when user tries to spawn the NPC.

ContentIcon/SetName.description: Sets the tool tip and the "nice" name to be displayed by the content icon.

ContentIcon/SetSpawnName.description: Sets the internal "name" for the content icon, usually a class name for an entity.
